rottapeli.domain

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • rottapeli.domain.superclasses.Entity
      • rottapeli.domain.superclasses.Positioned
        • rottapeli.domain.superclasses.Moveable
          • rottapeli.domain.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bouncable, Updatable

    public class Ball
extends Moveable
implements Bouncable
    Moving bouncing ball.

    Main hazard in the game. Moves with a constant speed. Changes direction only if it collides with an Entity that implements Bouncable interface. On collision kills entities that implement Killable interface.

    Author:
    Pavel

      • Ball

        Calling an Entity constructor without parameters will place the Entity in defaultPosition.

      • Ball

        public Ball(double x,
    double y,
    double ang)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        x - X position where Ball is created.
        y - Y position where Ball is created.
        ang - Initial direction in radians where ball moves to.

    • Method Detail

      • kill

        public void kill(Killable other)
        Calls die() method to the Entity given as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        other - Killable Entity that is to be killed.

      • bounceOff

        public void bounceOff(Bouncable other)
        Bounces off the Entity given as a parameter.

        When method is called, Ball will change its direction depending on its previous trajectory and the other Entity's location.

        Parameters:
        other - Entity from which Ball bounces off.

      • correctPosition

        public void correctPosition(Positioned other)
        Corrects position to prevent this entity being inside the other.

        This method is overriden by Ball. Instead of placing the ball at the edge of the other Entity, Ball is placed further away from the other Entity according to how much Ball penetrated the other Entity during collision. This way the game simulates where the Ball would be located between two timer ticks.

        Overrides:
        correctPosition in class Moveable
        Parameters:
        other - Entity in respect to which this entity's position is corrected.

      • reactToCollision

        public void reactToCollision(Entity other,
                    boolean notOnTheEdge)
        This method is called every collision in order to do further actions according to the collided entity's properties. Must be overriden if this Entity does anything on collisions

        Ball bounces off Bouncable Entities and kills Killable Entities on collision.

        Overrides:
        reactToCollision in class Moveable
        Parameters:
        other - Entity with which this Entity has collided.
        notOnTheEdge - true if other is truly inside this Entity, not simply on the edge.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method is called every tick on the timer.

        Ball moves and checks for collisions.

        Specified by:
        update in interface Updatable
        Overrides:
        update in class Moveable

      • defaultPosition

        public void defaultPosition()
        Places the Entity at a specified location. Must be overriden to be functional.

        Ball is placed at a random location. It is preferrable to call findNearestFreeSpot() after calling this method.

        Overrides:
        defaultPosition in class Positioned

      • draw

        public void draw(Graphics g,
        double offsetX,
        double offsetY,
        double xMultiplier,
        double yMultiplier)
        Contains instructions on how to represent this entity in the GameField.

        Ball is a red oval.

        Overrides:
        draw in class Positioned
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics data.
        offsetX - X position of the drawing field in respect to window's location.
        offsetY - Y position of the drawing field in respect to window's location.
        xMultiplier - Horizontal stretching based on window's width.
        yMultiplier - Vertical stretching based on window's height.
